name: Overdelivery
description:
Gameplay

In Overdelivery, you can either explore the city or drive against time to deliver goods such as food, coffee, correspondence, and more. Be careful not to run over pedestrians or crash into cars so you don't ruin your delivery or have integrity complaints. If you take too long to deliver, your customer will complain about the time.

Key Features

  • Drive around an open-world city!
  • Deliver different kinds of goods!
  • Be careful with traffic and pedestrians around the world!
  • Upgrade and Buy new bikes!

Missions and Exploration

Along your journey, new parts of the city will unlock so you can explore even more and unlock different missions. Complete all the tasks with a maximum rating to become the delivery king. Explore the downtown, suburbs, and the city's countryside.

Vehicles and Goods

Purchase and Upgrade new vehicles such as mopeds, scooters, and even superbikes!
